name: dictionaries
description: All the best English dictionaries and you are just one click away with this browser extension.

scripts.d: git checkout production 2>/dev/null || git checkout -b production && git merge main --no-edit && npm run build && git add dist -f && git commit -m 'Deployment commit' && git subtree push --prefix dist origin production && git checkout main
scripts.p: git add . && git commit && git push origin main
scripts.pd: npm run p && npm run d

author: Mikhail Sholokhov
